title: Brand is a support now?
body: So since when did this happen? I feel like brand mid is the best

Brand has changes on the PBE that exclusively help him solo lane: Units killed by his eruption restore mana.

He's always been both a mid and a kill-lane support because of his pressure and early damage

Brief bit of passing context on those changes - expect them to vanish from the PBE this week (probably tomorrow) and then return in a modified form the patch after. We're at the point where we need to lock down the patch and that Brand stuff needs a bit more work.

As a Midlane Brand main, I believe the simple change is to put his mana restore on his E and give his E bonus damage to minions and monsters. That boosts his waveclear substantially and provides Mana sustain in accordance with his current W into E waveclear pattern, all without making him do too much damage as a support in the laning phase. Waveclear and Mana sustain around CSing is the only way to bolster his midlane presence into being functional without being overpowered as a support, his kit is otherwise enjoyable and great to play besides his E being lackluster in it's range and functionality

P.S: His base AD is a little lower than most mages and makes CSing with autos extremely frustrating, a few small points of base AD early could go a long way
Are the changes looking good so far, i.e. is that probably the way you'll go (after maybe some tuning), or will you try out other paths?

Could you experiment with changing his E to *always* spread his burn passive (regardless of whether the target is burning or not) and then give it a different effect if the target is already burning? 

I realize that'd be a straight buff to his power level, but it'd make his waveclear much more satisfactory and comparable to other AoE mages in the midlane. It'd allow you to E + W a wave (instead of W + E) to get the bonus damage from W, which would also work with you adding mana refunds to his W on minion kill. 

Personally, I think his current E (low-damage, single-target, point & click ability) is really bland if the target isn't already burning - it only serves to enable his Q stun or stack his passive. If it spread his burn passive to all enemies near your target as a baseline, it'd be much more interesting and cohesive with his kit.
Meddler, Have you guys considered moving this restore mana to his E instead of his W? His waveclear pattern is almost always to W then E, so putting the mana restore on the W doesn't help very much.

This! I think it would open up much more for his playstyle if the E did it instead.

That said it might require maxing E so that it wouldn't be unbearably difficult to pull off.

He's been played as a support in solo queue for a long time now, and was also played at Worlds 2016 as a support champion by Albus Nox Luna's (now M19) support Likkrit as his pocket pick which was banned in almost every single game against him because of its strength and the inability of other teams to find a counter to it at the time.

With the update he received a while back making his passive stack and do an explosion for a large percentage of max HP, he saw a rise in popularity as a support pick as well as the fact that one spell landing guarantees your entire 3 stacks of procs from Spellthief's line is used immediately.
